document_title: Fatty liver: Causes, symptoms and prevention
subsection_name: gan-nhiem-mo.json_6_What to do to prevent fatty liver disease?
subsection_content:
A scientific lifestyle is a decisive factor in preventing fatty liver. Accordingly, patients should:
Follow a reasonable nutritional regimen. Increase fiber and good protein; Limit fat such as limiting fried foods, reducing starch and sugar intake; Exercise: This is a very important factor, regular exercise with appropriate intensity helps control and maintain a healthy weight. Regular health check-ups, vaccinations, protect the body. cure hepatitis diseases. If you have any diseases; Other liver problems, you need to take medicine as prescribed by your doctor
